import React from 'react' class About extends React.Component { render() { return (

Who Are We

Feasto is a full-fledged ecosystem which provides a seamless ordering experience in a restaurant. Our platform consists of a food app that can be downloaded from the App Store & software to accommodate the in house operations of the restaurant. First of all, the consumer app is used to order a desired meal from the menu in a restaurant or dining place, the consumer will be able to pay for their food upon serving. On the other side, sophisticated software is provided for the restaurant owner. Features ranging from keying in their menus & all the way to automated auditing. In addition to that Feasto also provides software for the kitchen side, where the kitchen staff will be able to prepare the meal according to the orders. The software comes with an inbuilt POS system, which allows the restaurant owners to manage the customers’ orders without any hassle.

Our Vision

The idea of Feasto was aroused from the complications caused by the global pandemic. Feasto wanted to ease the burden on businesses and make sure that everyone is staying safe. So Appvention Mediatech (Developers of Feasto) came up with a one-stop solution for the whole dine-in ecosystem. Through Feasto, customers will be able to reduce prolonged contact with restaurant waiters while taking their order and, so, they will be able to maintain social distancing. Businesses’ which are involved in the dine-in industry will be able to maintain their cash flow efficiently due to the lack of manpower required to run the business with the help of Feasto.
Our consumers will be able to download their app from the app store and the android play store. Through this app, the consumers will be able to order their desired meal by scanning the QR code on the table, upon ordering they will be able to make a payment from their phone itself, without having to approach the cashier counter.

Restaurant owners will have access to a wide range of Feasto products which will allow them to smoothly run the restaurant floor. The products that Feasto will provide for the restaurants will be as following:

1. Feasto POS
2. Feasto Restaurant Admin
3. Feasto KDS app
4. Feasto Waiter app

Through these products, the restaurant owner will be able to run operations smoothly on the restaurant floor whilst allowing for sophisticated features such as employee management and report generation which can be useful for auditing.
